short definition: 4 Foundations of Mindfulness
Mindfulness of the Body
details: Remaining focused on the body in & of itself—ardent, alert, & mindful—putting aside greed & distress with reference to the world.

short definition: Mindfulness of Feelings
details: Remain focused on feelings in & of themselves - feeling a painful feeling, a pleasant feeling, or a neither-painful-nor-pleasant feeling, he discerns as such

short definition: Mindfulness of Mind
details: Remain focused on the mind in & of itself - Mind has passion, without passion, aversion, without aversion, delusion, without delusion, etc, and he/she discerns the mind as such

short definition: Mindfulness of Mental Qualities
details: Remain focused on the mental qualities in & of themelves - with reference to the five hindrances, four noble truths, seven factors for Awakening, sixfold internal & external sense media, five clinging-aggregates

short definition: Restraining the 6 senses from unskilful contact
details: Not grasping at any theme or variations which unskillful qualitities such as greed or distress overwhelm upon reaching the faculty of eye, ear, nose, tongue, body & intellect

short definition: Giving up unskilful thoughts
details: Unskilful thoughts already arisen are to be dispelled including unskilful qualities

short definition: Growing awakening factors
details: Starting to grow awakening factors such as mindfulness, serentiy, persistence, dependent on seclusion, dispassion, cessation and resulting in letting go

short definition: Keeps up favorable concentration
details: Favorable themes of concentration are kept going such as the skeleton perception, orm-eaten perception, livid perception, festering perception, falling-apart perception, bloated perception

short definition: Bases of Power
Concentration founded on desire & fabrications of exertion
Concentration founded on persistence
Concentration founded on intent
Concentration founded on discrimination & fabrications of exertion
Faculties
Faith as seen in the four factors of stream entry
Persistence as seen in the four right exertions
Mindfulness as seen in the four frames of reference
Concentration as seen in the four jhānas
Discernment as seen in the four noble truths
The faculty of faith is to be seen in the four factors of stream entry
details: dependent on seclusion, dependent on dispassion, dependent on cessation, resulting in letting go

short definition: The faculty of energy is to be seen in the four right strivings
details: dependent on seclusion, dependent on dispassion, dependent on cessation, resulting in letting go

short definition: The faculty of faith is to be seen in the four establishments of mindfulness
details: dependent on seclusion, dependent on dispassion, dependent on cessation, resulting in letting go

short definition: The faculty of faith is to be seen here in the four jhanas
details: dependent on seclusion, dependent on dispassion, dependent on cessation, resulting in letting go

short definition: The faculty of faith is to be seen here in the four noble truths
details: dependent on seclusion, dependent on dispassion, dependent on cessation, resulting in letting go

short definition: mindfulness with regard to internal and external qualities
investigates, & scrutinizes internal and external qualities with discernment
bodily and mental persistence
rapture accompanied or unaccompanied by directed though & evaluation
bodily or mental serenity
concentration accompanied or unaccompanied by directed though & evaluation
equanimity with regard to internal and external qualities
In a knowledgeable person, immersed in clearl knowing, right view arises
details: Clear knowing is the leader in the attainmen of skillful qualities, followed by shame & compunction

short definition: In one of right view, right resolve arises
In one of right resolve, right speech arises
In one of right speech, right action arises
In one of right action, right livelihood arises
In one of right livelihood, right effort arises
In one of right effort, right mindfulness arises
In one of right mindfulness, right concentration arises
